item.text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ, the Son of God.

As it is written in the prophet Isaiah,

“Look, I am sending my messenger ahead of you,

who will prepare your way,

the voice of one shouting in the wilderness,

‘Prepare the way for the Lord,

make his paths straight.’”
In the wilderness John the baptizer began preaching a baptism of repentance for the forgiveness of sins.

People<n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2453">Judean</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">countryside</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="2415" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="1607">going out</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="907" class="">baptizing</st> them<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2446" class="">Jordan</st> <st data-num="4215" class="">River</st> as they <st data-num="1843" class="">confessed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>.

<st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="1746" class="">wore a garment</st> made of <st data-num="2574">camel’s</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> with a <st data-num="1193" class="">leather</st> <st data-num="2223" class="">belt</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3751" class="">waist</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2068" class="">ate</st> <st data-num="200" class="">locusts</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="66" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="3192" class="">honey</st>.<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaimed</st>,<n id="1" /> “One <st data-num="2478">more powerful</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me;</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2425" class="">worthy</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2425">bend down</st> and <st data-num="3089" class="">untie</st> the <st data-num="2438" class="">strap</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5266" class="">sandals</st>.
I baptize you with water, but he will baptize you with the Holy Spirit.”
Now in those days Jesus came from Nazareth in Galilee and was baptized by John in the Jordan River.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2117">just as</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="305">coming up</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4977">splitting apart</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4058" class="">dove</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven:</st> “<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> one <st data-num="27">dear</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son;</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> I <st data-num="2106">take great delight</st>.”<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">drove</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2048">wilderness</st>.<n id="1" />
He was in the wilderness 40 days, enduring temptations from Satan. He was with wild animals, and angels were ministering to his needs.
Now after John was imprisoned, Jesus went into Galilee and proclaimed the gospel of God.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “The <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> is <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="1448" class="">near</st>. <st data-num="3340" class="">Repent</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>!”

As he <st data-num="3855" class="">went</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">Sea</st> of <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>, he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="406" class="">Andrew</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon’s</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>, <st data-num="293">casting a net</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> (<st data-num="1063">for</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="231" class="">fishermen)</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1204">Follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="4160" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">into</st> <st data-num="231" class="">fishers</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>!”<n id="1" />

They <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> their <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> and <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="4260">Going on</st> a <st data-num="3641">little farther</st>, he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, the son of <st data-num="2199" class="">Zebedee</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> their<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4143">boat</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2675" class="">mending</st> <st data-num="1350" class="">nets</st>.
Immediately he called them, and they left their father Zebedee in the boat with the hired men and followed him.
Then they went to Capernaum. When the Sabbath came, Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach.

The people there<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="1605" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> one who <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2117">Just then</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> an <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="349">cried out</st>,<n id="2" />

“Leave <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> alone,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3479" class="">Nazarene</st>! Have you <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="622" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>? I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st>—the <st data-num="40">Holy One</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st><n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5392">Silence</st>! <st data-num="1831">Come out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”<n id="3" />

After <st data-num="4682" class="">throwing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4682">into convulsions</st>, the <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="5455">cried out</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> and <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

They were <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2284" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="5620">so that</st> they <st data-num="4802" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="1438">each other</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>? A <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>! He <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="2004" class="">commands</st> the <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="5219" class="">obey</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”
So the news about him spread quickly throughout all the region around Galilee.
Now as soon as they left the synagogue, they entered Simon and Andrew’s house, with James and John.

<st data-num="4613">Simon’s</st> <st data-num="3994" class="">mother-in-law</st> was <st data-num="2621" class="">lying down</st>, <st data-num="4445">sick with a fever</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3004" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2117">at once</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.

He <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1453">up</st> by <st data-num="2902">gently taking</st> her <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="4446" class="">fever</st> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> she began to <st data-num="1247" class="">serve</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

When it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st>, <st data-num="3753">after</st> <st data-num="1416" class="">sunset</st>, they <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">The</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> <st data-num="1996" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>.
So he healed many who were sick with various diseases and drove out many demons. But he would not permit the demons to speak because they knew him.
Then Jesus got up early in the morning when it was still very dark, departed, and went out to a deserted place, and there he spent time in prayer.

<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="3588 3326">companions</st> <st data-num="2614">searched for</st> <st data-num="846">him</st>.

When they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3956">Everyone</st> is <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”

He <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “Let us <st data-num="71" class="">go</st> <st data-num="237" class="">elsewhere</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the surrounding <st data-num="2969" class="">villages</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> I can <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1519 3778">that is what</st> I <st data-num="1831">came out</st> here to do.”<n id="2" />
So he went into all of Galilee preaching in their synagogues and casting out demons.
Now a leper came to him and fell to his knees, asking for help. “If you are willing, you can make me clean,” he said.

<st data-num="3710">Moved with indignation</st>,<n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1614">stretched out</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="681">touched</st><n id="3" /> him, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “I am <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st>. Be <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st>!”

The <st data-num="3014" class="">leprosy</st> <st data-num="565" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846">him</st> <st data-num="2117">at once</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> he was <st data-num="2511" class="">clean</st>.

<st data-num="2117" class="">Immediately</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">sent</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1544">away</st> with a <st data-num="1690">very strong warning</st>.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3708">See</st> that you do <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2036" class="">say</st> anything to <st data-num="3367" class="">anyone</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st>, <st data-num="1166" class="">show</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> to a <st data-num="2409" class="">priest</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4374">bring the offering</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="4367" class="">commanded</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2512" class="">cleansing</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”<n id="4" />

But as the man went out he began to announce it publicly and spread the story widely, so that Jesus was no longer able to enter any town openly but stayed outside in remote places. Still they kept coming to him from everywhere.
